title: Top lane turned from an island to a wading pool
body:
Mid has two areas to gank from, top bush, or bot bush. Maybe, if overextended, side of top or bot bush. Bot has one area to gank from, which is top, so only 2 wards to cover 2 people from a jungler. Meanwhile, Top you can:
Go through botside wall
Go over botside bush w/ blast cone
Come in from behind tribush
Come in from Krugs tribush
Come straight up river
And for someone CC heavy, like Warwick or Rammus, you would need to sprinkle wards all over the river to even hope of making it possible to not get ganked. Don't even get me started on Kayn.
So as most top laners have little non-targeted mobility, sitting on top lane and camping your top is almost always the best way to jungle. How do you play top if you have to throw away a full item's worth of control wards to stop this turtle from violating you?

replies.body: Isn't the top side and the bot side mirrored and flipped? You have the exact same amount of ways to be ganked as you do from being bot

Aside from the part where you have another person warding with you (please) and another person that potentially save your ass. 

In top lane it's you and what ever God you pray to when you get ganked. I really hope you bought a control ward...

I highly recommend you watch some of SoloRenektonOnly videos on youtube or even his stream. He goes into very good detail about how to use proper wave management to avoid ganks, own the wave, and how to tell if the enemy jungler is nearby based on your opponents actions. It's a hell of a lot of information, but it should help
